spell_tooltip.description: 15% of all damage you take is stored. The stored amount cannot exceed 12% of your maximum health. The initial damage of your next Shadow Word: Pain deals this stored damage to your target.
While Voidform or Dark Ascension is not active, being attacked will reduce the cooldown of Void Eruption and Dark Ascension by 3 sec.

Summons a Psyfiend with 369,590 health for 12 sec beside you to attack the target at range with Psyflay.

 Psyflay
Deals up to 1% of the target's total health in Shadow damage every 0.8 sec. Also slows their movement speed by 50% and reduces healing received by 50%.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 106,281 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 45,571 Holy damage to enemies and up to 26,666 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.

Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 174,910 and dealing 297,228 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 29,693.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 152,117.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 50,705.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 246,491 Shadow damage plus an additional 301,724 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 38,356 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 46 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 979,810 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 673,938 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Aim a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at the destination, dealing 75,772 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 176,765 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Vampiric Touch deals 15% additional damage and has a chance to generate 1 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1.2 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 80% faster on all targets for 3 sec.

Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a 6% chance to create Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch. 

Critical strikes increase the chance to 12%.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 13,343 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

After conjuring Shadowy Apparitions, gain a stack of Idol of Yogg-Saron. At 25 stacks, you summon a Thing from Beyond that casts Void Spike at nearby enemies for 20 sec.

 Void Spike
Hurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing 104,709 Shadow damage and 22,180 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent have a chance to spawn a Void Tendril that channels Mind Flay or Void Lasher that channels Mind Sear at your target.

 Mind Flay
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 362,857 Shadow damage over 15 sec and slowing their movement speed by 30%.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Sear
Corrosive shadow energy radiates from the target, dealing 189,041 Shadow damage over 15 sec to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity over the duration.

Casting Halo also causes you to create a Halo around you at 100% effectiveness every 5 sec for 10 sec.

Additionally, the radius of Halo is increased by 10 yards.
Your damage dealt is increased by 12% while Dark Ascension is active and by 20% while Voidform is active.
Enemies damaged by your Halo take 2% increased damage from you for 8 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Creating a Halo grants Surge of Insanity.
Halo damage reduces enemy movement speed by 5% for 5 sec, stacking up to 5 times.
Power Word: Fortitude grants you an additional 5% stamina.

Increases the damage done by Mind Flay: Insanity and Mind Spike: Insanity by 60%.

Increases the healing done by Flash Heals affected by Surge of Light by 30%.
Halo damage and healing is increased by 30%.
Your Power Infusion effect grants you an additional 10% haste.
Consuming Surge of Insanity has a 100% chance to conjure Shadowy Apparitions.
Halo now centers around you and returns to you after it reaches its maximum distance, healing allies and damaging enemies each time it passes through them.
Fill the target with faith in the light, healing for 251,612 over 15 sec.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Places a ward on an ally that heals them for 64,967 the next time they take damage, and then jumps to another ally within 30 yds. Jumps up to 4 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.
Psychic Scream causes enemies to tremble in place instead of fleeing in fear.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 103,736 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
Each time Shadow Word: Pain deals damage, the healing of your next Flash Heal is increased by 3%, up to a maximum of 60%.
Activating Fade removes all snare effects.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
After being struck by a melee or ranged critical hit, heal 20% of the damage taken over 6 sec.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.
Increases the amount of damage required to break your Psychic Scream by 75%.
For 12 sec after casting Power Word: Shield, you deal 10% additional damage and healing with Smite and Holy Nova.
Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing all harmful Magic from 5 friendly targets and 1 beneficial Magic effect from 5 enemy targets. Potent enough to remove Magic that is normally undispellable.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 5% for 15 sec after a critical heal with Flash Heal.
When cast on yourself, 30% of damage you deal refills your Power Word: Shield.
Your Mind Blast critical strikes reduce your target's movement speed by 75% for 4 sec.
While above 75% health, the cast time of your Flash Heal is reduced by 5%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 30,257.
Power Word: Shield instantly heals the target for 35,494 and reflects 6% of damage absorbed.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 152,117.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 50,705.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 246,491 Shadow damage plus an additional 301,724 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 37,848 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 46 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 979,810 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 667,242 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Hurl a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at your target, dealing 76,580 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at your target.

After casting Vampiric Touch on a target, your next Vampiric Touch within 8 sec is instant cast and deals 672,215 Shadow damage immediately.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 174,940 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Blasts the target for 159,388 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 4 Insanity.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.

Mind Spike increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast by 30%, stacking up to 3 times.

Lasts 10 sec.
Vampiric Touch deals 30% additional damage and has a chance to generate 2 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1.2 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 80% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast and Void Torrent deal 20% more damage.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 13,263 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.

Summons a Mindbender to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Mindbender attacks.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.
Your Shadowy Apparitions deal 15% increased damage and have a chance to generate 1 Insanity.
Mind Blast and Shadow Word: Death cause your Mindbender or Shadowfiend to teleport behind your target, slashing up to 5 nearby enemies for 66,982 Shadow damage and extending its duration by 0.7 sec.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 80% faster on all targets for 3 sec.

Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a 6% chance to create Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch. 

Critical strikes increase the chance to 12%.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 13,512 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

After conjuring Shadowy Apparitions, gain a stack of Idol of Yogg-Saron. At 25 stacks, you summon a Thing from Beyond that casts Void Spike at nearby enemies for 20 sec.

 Void Spike
Hurls a bolt of dark magic, dealing 103,971 Shadow damage and 21,973 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yards of the target. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.
Dispels Magic on the enemy target, removing 1 beneficial Magic effect.

Summons a shadowy fiend to attack the target for 15 sec.

Generates 2 Insanity each time the Shadowfiend attacks.
Increases healing done by Flash Heal by 15%.

A word of dark binding that inflicts 104,609 Shadow damage to your target. If your target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, you take backlash damage equal to 5% of your maximum health.

Damage increased by 250% to targets below 20% health.

Generates 4 Insanity.
An explosion of holy light around you deals up to 45,477 Holy damage to enemies and up to 26,521 healing to allies within 13 yds, reduced if there are more than 5 targets.
Casting Flash Heal on yourself reduces all damage you take by 10% for 10 sec.
Places a feather at the target location, granting the first ally to walk through it 40% increased movement speed for 5 sec. Only 3 feathers can be placed at one time.

If your Shadow Word: Death fails to kill a target at or below 20% health, its cooldown is reset. Cannot occur more than once every 10 sec.  If a target dies within 7 sec after being struck by your Shadow Word: Death, you gain 8 Insanity.
Reduces all magic damage taken by 3%.
Pulls the spirit of a party or raid member, instantly moving them directly in front of you.

Controls a mind up to 1 level above yours for 30 sec while still controlling your own mind. Does not work versus Demonic, Mechanical, or Undead beings or players. This spell shares diminishing returns with other disorienting effects.
Reduces the cooldown of Leap of Faith by 30 sec.

Infuses the target with power for 15 sec, increasing haste by 20%.

Can only be cast on players.
Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy for 12 sec, causing you to heal a nearby ally for 50% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal.
Shadow Word: Death deals 50% less damage to you.
Power Word: Shield and Leap of Faith increase your target's movement speed by 40% for 3 sec.
Power Infusion also grants you its effect at 100% value when used on an ally. If no ally is targeted, it will grant its effect at 100% value to a nearby ally, preferring damage dealers.

Sanguine Teachings
Sanguine Teachings grants an additional 2% Leech.

 Vampiric Embrace
Reduces the cooldown of Vampiric Embrace by 30 sec, increases its healing done by 25%.
After damaging or healing a target below 35% health, gain 10% increased damage and healing for 8 sec.
Shadow Word: Pain deals an additional 5% damage. When an enemy dies while afflicted by your Shadow Word: Pain, you gain 2 Insanity.

Creates a ring of Shadow energy around you that quickly expands to a 46 yd radius, healing allies for 174,778 and dealing 300,215 Shadow damage to enemies. Healing reduced beyond 6 targets.

Generates 10 Insanity.
Fade reduces damage you take by 10%.
When your Shadow Word: Pain expires or is refreshed with less than 5 sec remaining, a nearby ally within 46 yards is healed for 29,966.
Increases the maximum health gained from Desperate Prayer by 15%.
Reduces the cooldown of Fade by 10 sec.
You take 2% less damage from enemies affected by your Shadow Word: Pain.
When an attack brings you below 30% health, you gain an absorption shield equal to 15% of your maximum health for 20 sec. Cannot occur more than once every 90 sec.

Attacks from your Shadowfiend siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 152,117.

Attacks from your Mindbender siphon life from enemies, healing a nearby injured ally for 50,705.
Increases the range of most spells by 15%.

Afflicts the target with a disease that instantly causes 246,491 Shadow damage plus an additional 301,724 Shadow damage over 6 sec. Heals you for 30% of damage dealt.

If this effect is reapplied, any remaining damage will be added to the new Devouring Plague.

Disperse into pure shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 75% for 6 sec and healing you for 25% of your maximum health over its duration, but you are unable to attack or cast spells.

Increases movement speed by 50% and makes you immune to all movement impairing effects.

Castable while stunned, feared, or silenced.

Mind Blast, Devouring Plague, and Void Bolt conjure Shadowy Apparitions that float towards all targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch for 38,180 Shadow damage. 

Critical strikes increase the damage by 100%.
Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 4 sec. Against non-players, also interrupts spellcasting and prevents any spell in that school from being cast for 4 sec.
Healing from Vampiric Touch and Devouring Plague when you are at maximum health will shield you for the same amount. The shield cannot exceed 10% of your maximum health.
Vampiric Touch also applies Shadow Word: Pain to the target. Shadow Word: Pain lasts an additional 5 sec.
Mind Blast gains an additional charge.

Your direct damage spells inflict 35% of their damage on all other targets afflicted by your Vampiric Touch within 46 yards.

Does not apply to damage from Shadowy Apparitions, Shadow Word: Pain, and Vampiric Touch.

Every 2 casts of Devouring Plague transforms your next Mind Flay or Mind Spike into a more powerful spell. Can accumulate up to 4 charges.

 Mind Flay: Insanity
Assaults the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 979,810 Shadow damage over 1.2 sec and slowing their movement speed by 70%.

Generates 12 Insanity over the duration.

Mind Spike: Insanity
Blasts the target for 684,732 Shadowfrost damage.

Generates 12 Insanity.

Aim a bolt of slow-moving Shadow energy at the destination, dealing 76,685 Shadow damage to all enemies within 8 yds.

Generates 6 Insanity.

This spell is cast at a selected location.

Releases an explosive blast of pure void energy, activating Voidform and causing 175,505 Shadow damage to all enemies within 10 yds of your target.

During Voidform, this ability is replaced by Void Bolt.

Casting Devouring Plague increases the duration of Voidform by 2.5 sec.

Increases the damage of Mind Flay and Mind Spike by 10%.

The duration of your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch is increased by 1 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Flay and 2 sec when enemies suffer damage from Mind Spike.
Shadow Crash applies Vampiric Touch to up to 8 targets it damages.
Shadow Word: Pain periodic damage has a chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Mind Blast and cause your next Mind Blast to be instant.
Voidform and Dark Ascension increase the critical strike chance of your spells by 10% for 20 sec, reducing by 0.5% every sec.
Increases your Devouring Plague damage by 6% and increases your maximum Insanity by 50.
Vampiric Touch deals 15% additional damage and has a chance to generate 1 Insanity each time it deals damage.
Your Mind Flay, Mind Spike, and Void Torrent damage increase the damage of your periodic Shadow effects by 2%, stacking up to 5 times.
Reduces the Insanity cost of Devouring Plague by 5.
Your Shadow Word: Pain damage has a chance to reset the cooldown of Shadow Word: Death, increase its damage by 25%, and deal damage as if striking a target below 20% health.

Channel a torrent of void energy into the target, dealing 1.2 million Shadow damage over 3 sec.

Generates 24 Insanity over the duration.
Increases the critical strike chance of Mind Blast, Mind Spike, Mind Flay, and Shadow Word: Death by 8% and increases their critical strike damage by 40%.
Devouring Plague causes your Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch to deal damage 40% faster on all targets for 3 sec.
While you have Shadow Word: Pain, Devouring Plague, and Vampiric Touch active on the same target, your Mind Blast and Void Torrent deal 40% more damage.
Reduces the cooldown of Void Torrent by 15 sec.

Your periodic Shadow Word: Pain and Vampiric Touch damage has a 30% chance to apply Echoing Void, max 4 targets.

Each time Echoing Void is applied, it has a chance to collapse, consuming a stack every 1 sec to deal 13,382 Shadow damage to all nearby enemies. Damage reduced beyond 5 targets.

If an enemy dies with Echoing Void, all stacks collapse immediately.

Mind Sear

Entropic Rift upgrades Mind Blast into Void Blast while it is active.

Void Blast:
Sends a blast of cosmic void energy at the enemy, causing 630,029 Shadow damage.

Generates 6 Insanity.
Vampiric Touch and Shadow Word: Pain deal 35% additional damage.
Shadow Word: Death consumes absorb shields from your target, dealing 320,098 extra damage to them and granting you 5 Insanity if a shield was present.
Summoning an Entropic Rift grants you Mind Devourer.
Shadow Word: Death has a high chance to summon a Shadowfiend for 5 sec when damaging targets below 20% health.
While Entropic Rift is active, your Shadow damage is increased by 10%.
Void Blast generates 100% additional Insanity.
Every 3 sec siphon an amount equal to 4% of your health from an ally within 40 yds if they are higher health than you.
